q: If Michael, Mary, and James can complete a work in 20, 30, and 60 days respectively. In how many days can Micheal complete the work if Mary and James help him on every third day?

Jennifer can complete \( \frac{1}{4} th\) of a job in 3 days and Susan can complete \( \frac{1}{6} th \) of the same job in 4 days. If they work together USD 180 will be paid to them in total then what is the amount paid to Jennifer?

Alice and Lisa complete a certain task in 18 days, Lisa and Paul can complete it 24 days, and Alice and Paul can complete it in 36 days. In how many days will Alice and Paul finish the task if they work individually?

a.option: Alice and Paul will take 48 and 144 days respectively.
Alice and Paul will take 45 and 148 days respectively.
Alice and Paul will take 30 and 144 days respectively.
Alice and Paul will take 48 and 133 days respectively.

q: Daniel completes a task in 10 days and Lisa completes the same task in 15 days. In how many days can they complete the task if they work together?

John completes a task in 7 days by working 9 hours every day and Bob completes the same task in 6 days by working 7 hours every day. How many days will they take to complete the task by working together for 8 hours per day?
Bob takes 8 hours to complete a job and Ben takes 10 hours to complete the same Job. How long will it take if Bob and Ben work together but independently to complete the same job?
Mike and Tara can complete a piece of work in 4 days together. If Mike alone can complete the same work in 12 days, in how many days can Tara alone complete that work?

Paul takes 8 hours to complete a job and Lisa takes 10 hours to complete the same job. If they both work together, then how long will they take to complete the job:

  1.  \(\frac {4}{9} \)
  2.  \(2\frac {4}{9}\)
  3.  \(3 \frac {4}{9}\)
  4.  \(4 \frac {4}{9}\)
Bob can complete a certain job in \(12\) days. Tara is \(60\%\) more efficient than Bob. How many days will Tara alone take to complete the same job?
Mary and Charles can complete a work in 4 days together. If Mary alone can complete the same work in 12 days, in how many days can Charles alone complete the work?
Johnson works twice more than Ben to complete a work and together they can finish the work in 18 days. In how many days will Johnson alone finish the work?
